column1: # Distribution of GFAS tracers to LOTOS-EUROS tracers.
#   name       :  name of emission data, here a tracer name
#   variables  :  formula with names of variables in GFAS files
#                 this could be used to add or subtract variables to form the emission data
#   molemass   :  assumed molemass as number in g/mole or as formula
#                 this is only used for the gasses to convert from "kg emitted" to "mole emitted"
#   tracers    :  formula that defines how emission data should be distributed over LOTOS-EUROS tracers
# * Fraction NO from NOx : 0.9    (Andrea and Merlet, 2001)
#   Note that in original code molemass NO was used for NO fraction, and NO2 for NO2 fraction ...
#   Here we assume "NOx" is in "kg NO2 equivalent".
# * mole masses as formula, or as number in [g/mole]
#   values as used in MOZART model:
# * emission "pm2p5fire" is total fine matter, as sum of primary mater, bc, and oc.
#    Initial version based on hardcoded parameterizations.
# gasses, molemass needed to convert from kg to moles:

column3: C + H * 3 + C + O + C + H * 3
